items.sentence: Tom didn\'t know how many of them needed help.
Tom didn\'t know how to cope with the problem.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary could speak French.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary had gotten married.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary wanted him to stay.
Tom thinks that nothing bad can happen to him.
Tom thought Mary knew how much he hated opera.
Tom thought Mary would likely know what to do.
Don\'t you think Tom would want to go with us?
Don\'t you think that Tom is kind of handsome?
